title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Live logs & prosper: Use AI to make logs a primary observability signal(AIM346)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 实时日志与繁荣：使用AI将日志打造为主要可观测性信号(AIM346)
abstract: Logs carry the richest context for troubleshooting, yet brittle pipelines, fragile parsers, and cost-driven sampling keep teams stuck in reactive grep mode. This session introduces Elastic's AI-powered Streams, an agentic system that automatically understands and enriches any log format (structured or unstructured), simplifies ingestion, parsing, storage, and analysis, and surfaces significant events and anomalies out of the box. The result: logs become your first and smartest investigative signal, accelerating root-cause analysis and delivering actionable insights in production. Live logs and prosper! This presentation is brought to you by Elastic, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 日志承载着最丰富的故障排查上下文，但脆弱的管道、易损的解析器以及成本驱动的采样使团队陷入被动的 grep 模式。本次会议介绍 Elastic 的 AI 驱动 Streams，这是一个智能体系统，能够自动理解和丰富任何日志格式（结构化或非结构化），简化摄取、解析、存储和分析，并开箱即用地呈现重要事件和异常。结果是：日志成为您首要且最智能的调查信号，加速根因分析并在生产环境中提供可操作的洞察。让日志活起来并繁荣发展！本演示由 Elastic（AWS 合作伙伴）为您呈现。
